DOC.brief_summary: The GyneFix-Viz frameless copper intrauterine device ( IUD ) use contraception . The GyneFix IUD market Europe Asia 10 year . The new anchor GyneFix IUD design visible ultrasound could improve safety reduce fail insertion perforation . We need know easy doctor see measure distance anchor outside uterus . The purpose open , prospective , observational study assess feasibility measure distance serosa uterus anchor follow insertion GyneFix-Viz follow-up 6-8 week later . Secondary objective assess ease pain insertion , acceptability device Canadian woman complication . We also compare expulsion rate post-abortion woman .
